title: Bristol

content:
P1

* Thye have another form for writing competency stories
* There are forms for eliciting feedback but rarely used (they are not good)
* Leaves a week to write/prepare review
* in some jobs kept a diary of things done
* not this time though because of the detail in objs
* competencies ask for 6 examples so only need to remember 6 key things
* new thing would be good because of mitigating risk of losing docs when moving role/department every 6 months
* would jog my memory for me to know which obj I haven’t worked on for a while
* no clear connection between obj and competencies
* I have sometimes stolen them form my manager. When they’d done the same role
* Everything is Collaborating and Partnering
* It would be quite easy to go in at the end of the week and add what I’ve done
* usually have competency doc printed out and next to me when writing examples
* not apparent what is visible by the manager and what isn;t
title: P1

content:
Commercial officers training event

2 Feb 16, 17 people

Feedback 73% Good or Very good

5 presentations

> Thank you so much for the training event you hosted for us last week. I found the presentations very interesting and they gave me a great overview of the role and future plans for our department. It was also great to meet with others in a similar situation to me. Id be very keen to be involved in future events so please let me know what youre planning.

- MJ Broadbent

> I manage 3 commercial officers and they have all fed back to me that the training was excellent. I have another 2 who I will be encouraging strongly to participate in future events.
title: Collab

title: Collab

content:
Development - want to lead a team or group with strategic roadmap setting responsibilities. Have exp in leading groups, strategy writing, comms, mentoring. Seen a similar role discussed but want to know how to position myself to be a contender. Talk to Alexis? 

Relevant for Leading and communicating, Achieving commercial outcomes, Changing and improving. 

Experience with KPMG / Accenture might be an advantage. Refresh contacts, attend networking event on 14 April.
title: Places to EAT

content:
Weekly design update

Been a week of consolidating really. CS Digital have been taking stock. Prototype has had mixed reviews. Distinct user groups responded well others not so well. We’ve been trying to unpick why this was the case and what we should or could take forward into a private beta.

With CSL we’ve been trying to strip back what they are trying to do. Often rushing a prototype for one thing and moving quickly on to the next. This hasn’t worked and has confused users. So we’ve been designing a really simple journey for a specific task a user has.
title: Weekly design update

content:
Brief EnhanceConf notes

Cut the mustard

Investigate atomic design more

Let links be links, article



ROCA style .org

No one cares as much about your product as you do! 

Function of design: develop creditability through design (ESTA example)

Effort != Value

Thoughtful reduction vs mindless addition

design comes from the word to clarify, not to prettify

It takes a while for each new medium to develop it’s own vocabulary
title: Brief EnhanceConf notes
